clean_lid.description: Clean the kettle lid to remove any dust or any other particles.

press_lid.description: Press down onto the kettle lid.

clean_kettlebody.description: Clean the kettle body to remove any dust or any other particles.

clean_whole_kettle.description: Clean the entire kettle including the kettle body and the lid.

use_kettle.description: Press the lid and then clean the whole kettle.
